ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Class envy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For my guild, this shield goes to monks before alot of other classes.  Why?  Because they pull, and when you re the puller in poh, there is no better
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 Apr 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> At 02:24 PM 4/12/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >Is there some logical reason why we don get to equip this item?
> >
> >Shield of Rainbow Hues: AC 18. +20 to all resistances. Classes: Mk, P,
> >Ra, Ro, SK, Wr. Found in the plane of fear.
> >
> >Or should we petition to get included?
>
>
> Why do Monks get a shield at all?! There's something very wrong here.
>

For my guild, this shield goes to monks before alot of other
classes. Why? Because they pull, and when you're the puller in poh,
there is no better shield to help with fear and increase your AC more than
this one. Monks being able to equip this shield is an ability we take
advantage up, so don't discount it :P.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
